channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole between lanes 2 & 3, 6th February

item.title: Potholes, 6th February
item.description:
There are potholes all the way along Hewlitt Road. General state of disrepair from high turnover of traffic. These potholes stretch right the way to the roundabout at All Saints Road. The path ways could do with a real good looking at too. My mother can't travel on her disability scooter most of the way up this street as its too dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 229 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole near side of the road St Paul’s Road Cheltenham, 6th February
item.description:
This pothole is near the side of a road where a cyclist is likely to travel. Although it is only 40cm long and about 10cm wide, it is deep in places and could catch a wheel very easily Opposite 31 St Paul’s Road on opppsite side of the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 32 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham
